title: Hammad M
tagline: Multibody Dynamics Research, Among Other Things

videos.title: Humvee driving on soft soil/mud
videos.description: Simulation of a 3500 kg Humvee driving on bed of mud

videos.title: Cohesive Foam Simulation
videos.description: Simulation of material composed of spheres, ellipsoids, cylinders and boxes with a high value of cohesion resulting in a stiff foam like material.

videos.title: Angle Of Repose
videos.description: An experiment to measure the angle of repose for the polyamide 12 (PA 650) powder used in the SLS process. This measurement was used to determine the correct friction parameters and calibrate the numerical model.

videos.title: SLS Simulation
videos.description: Simulation showing the layering process of a Selective Laser Sintering machine

videos.title: Walking in Snow
videos.description: A cohesive particle based method used to simulate a legged character walking through snow
